gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop

Class OldApiWritableFileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<Object,Writable,Object,Writable>
        • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.OldApiWritableFileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<Object,Writable>

    public class OldApiWritableFileSource
extends OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<Object,Writable,Object,Writable>
    An extension of OldApiHadoopFileInputSource for sources in Writable format using a FileInputFormat. The FileInputFormat can either be specified using HadoopFileInputSource.FILE_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS_KEY, or by specifying a deserializer via HiveSerDeWrapper.SERDE_DESERIALIZER_TYPE.

        protected OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor<Object,Writable,Object,Writable> getExtractor(WorkUnitState workUnitState,

                                                                                       FileSplit fileSplit,
                                                                                       boolean readKeys)
        Description copied from class: OldApiHadoopFileInputSource
        Get a OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor instance.
        Specified by:
        getExtractor in class OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<Object,Writable,Object,Writable>
        Parameters:
        workUnitState - a WorkUnitState object carrying Gobblin configuration properties
        recordReader - a Hadoop RecordReader object used to read input records
        fileSplit - the FileSplit to read input records from
        readKeys - whether the OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor should read keys of type #; by default values of type #>V> are read.
        Returns:
        a OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor instance
